CustomProfile.Description: Arcana Heart 3 (eX‑Board) continues the all‑girl fighting series with new fighters and features. The roster adds sword‑wielding Weiss and her artificial Arcana Geist companion Gottfried, plus the whimsical Eko with her Arcana Sharigurama. Built on the eX‑Board hardware, the game introduces refined mechanics and expanded storylines while maintaining the series’ signature Arcana customization and fast‑paced 2D combat.
